emuInput.TitMainTitle: Emily King, E. Bernice Coleman, Helen Delany, Sarah Moore, and Gladys Beverly, standing in front of painted stone backdrop, for Beauty Shop Owners' Fashion Review in Schenley High School
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 24, 1945, pg. 8 reads: "Gorgeous Glamour Girls - This bevy of fashionable young women added plenty of dash and charm to the Beauty Shop Owners' Fashion Revue, Tuesday evening, in Schenley High School Auditorium. Smartly dressed from head to toe, they set the pace for styles in Easter Parade and summer sports wear.  Right photo, suited and ready for Easter: Emily King, E. Bernice Coleman, Helen Delany, Sarah Moore, and Gladys Beverly.-Harris Photo."  Related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 24, 1945, pg. 13
